The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 02 September is 2,978 (344.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 29 August, there were 51 new confirmed cases (5.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 22 August, there were 56 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 9% (5 fewer cases).
